member.name: T:CRM.Contact
member.summary: This class is designed to manage a Contact

member.name: M:CRM.Contact.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This constructor allow to create a new contact object
member.param: path to the contact's profil image

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.Name
member.summary: This property gets the contact's name

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.Firstname
member.summary: This property gets the contact's firstname

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.DateOfBirth
member.summary: This property gets the contact's date of birth

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.Nationality
member.summary: This property gets the contact's nationality

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.Email
member.summary: This property gets the contact's email

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.PathToImg
member.summary: This property gets the path to the contact' profil image and allow to update the value. It's impact the lastupdate value also.

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.CreationDate
member.summary: This property gets the contact's creation date

member.name: P:CRM.Contact.LastUpdate
member.summary: This property gets the contact's lastupdate This date is update as soon as a property is updated.
